occupation: Backbone IP Network Intern at Orange
headline: Dual Degree Student | Master in ITM: Data analytics - IIT | MSc in Telecommunications Engineering - UPM
summary:
I've always been a naturally curious person who has a strong desire to understand the workings of the world, and I'm especially drawn to the exciting world of technology. 

This curiosity drove me to pursue a comprehensive educational journey, culminating in a Bachelor's Degree and an MSc in Telecommunications Engineering from Madrid's UPM.

I love being able to apply my knowledge in software and the technologies existing in the data world, that's why I am looking forward to obtaining a position in a high challenging engineering environment where my academic skills, experience and creativity will add highest value to the organization.

experiences.title: Backbone IP Network Intern
experiences.description:
Closely collaborated with experienced professionals in configuring, maintaining, and optimizing Orange's high-speed network infrastructure.
Participated also in identifying and resolving network issues, contributing to the performance and reliability of the IP backbone network.
Assisted in technical documentation and report generation related to network improvement projects by using SQL.

experiences.title: Robotics Teacher
experiences.description:
Taught robotics in several schools for a couple of years. Had a group of 10 students and explained the assembly process as well as the programming process. Also taught how to program simple video games
using the Construct tool.

education.degree_name: Master of Information Technology and Management: Major in Data analytics.
education.description:
Relevant Coursework:
- Data Mining & Machine Learning (Python project, supervised and unsupervised learning, outlier detection, association rules, recommender systems )
- Advanced Topics in Data Management (Advanced SQL, Access and Oracle SQL Developer)
- Programming for Data Analytics (R, Statistics, Linear regression)
- Database security
- Object-Oriented System Analysis, Modeling and Design
- Data Warehousing

2 years of Master's Degree. The first of which is general and the second of which is specialized.
Relevant Coursework:
- Communication systems
- Multimedia systems and services 
- Applications and services
- Communication networks
- Integration of networks, applications and content
- Strategic vision of the integration of technologies and systems in the ICT sector

ABET accreditation.

education.degree_name: Magistrale in Communications and Computer Networks Engineering
education.description:
Six months of the Bachelor’s Degree were taken at Politecnico di Torino. Studying abroad gave me a broader perspective of the world, as well as increasing my ability to be independent and responsible.
Relevant Coursework:
- Computer Networks Design and management.
- Distributted systems programming.
- Data Science and Database Technology
- Information System Security

Major in Computer Science
ABET accreditation.
education.activities_and_societies: Member of the Academic Program (English Group).

accomplishment_projects.title: Development of a Restaurant Management System
accomplishment_projects.description: Developed a web-app  with a connected database that was used as a Restaurant Management Systems. It allowed to add new restaurants, new meals, new clients and add new orders. Used Oracle as RDBMS and use Java Script as programming language.

accomplishment_projects.title: Development of a tool for realistic network traffic generation and orchestration based on user behavior
accomplishment_projects.description:
Developed an innovative tool to create and coordinate realistic network traffic based on user behavior
patterns. It aims to provide an accurate simulation of user interactions on a network, enabling
comprehensive testing and analysis of network infrastructure.
Traffic was created by commands entered in Linux terminal and checked by Wireshark. The tool was
developed with Python

certifications.name: Curso de monitor de ocio y tiempo libre
